I have two issues with the kinds of montages. First of all the video quality. You need at least 720p for it to be remotely worth watching in my opinion. So many videos are out there of premiership games and you can barely see a thing. Next is the pacing of the video. Apart from trying to time the big hits to the drops there is not much else done with the music. Might seem me being a bit petty but that's how I feel about a lot of these channels. BsporTV and the like.
http://i.imgur.com/wVtUHZg.gifv

I agree. I think in the heat of the moment and passion of the day the NZ fans were confused as to what happened and can only have thought that O'Driscoll must have landed awkwardly until well after the event when they properly saw the highlights.

I remember seeing that try while I was making this particular video. It's crazy just how many incredible highlights there were in his career . There were simply so many so many that this video could have easily been 10 minutes or longer.
